price: Ṣé wọn kò mọ̀ pé dájúdájú Allāhu Òun l’Ó ń gba ìronúpìwàdà lọ́wọ́ àwọn ẹrúsìn Rẹ̀, Ó sì ń gba àwọn ọrẹ, àti pé dájúdájú Allāhu, Òun ni Olùgba-ìronúpìwàdà, Àṣàkẹ́-ọ̀run?
arabic: أَلَمۡ يَعۡلَمُوٓاْ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ هُوَ يَقۡبَلُ ٱلتَّوۡبَةَ عَنۡ عِبَادِهِۦ وَيَأۡخُذُ ٱلصَّدَقَٰتِ وَأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ هُوَ ٱلتَّوَّابُ ٱلرَّحِيمُ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: alam yaʿlamū anna al-laha huwa yaqbalu al-tawbata ʿan ʿibādihi wayakhudhu al-ṣadaqāti wa-anna al-laha huwa al-tawābu al-raḥīmu
